name: Palkia
author: 5ban Graphics
flavor_text: It has the ability to distort space. It is described as a deity in Sinnoh-region mythology.

abilities.name: Absolute Space
abilities.effect: As long as this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, your opponent can’t play any Stadium cards from their hand.

attacks.name: Overdrive Smash
attacks.effect: During your next turn, this Pokémon’s Overdrive Smash attack does 80 more damage (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
